435:644: dharmaratī ramiṣyi viṣayairna rami ramati manaḥ||116||
435:646: yāva ca yauvanaṃ na galitaṃ prathamavayadharo
435:647: yāva ca vyādhi nākramati te na ca jara asitā|
435:648: yāva ca rūpayauvanadharo vayamapi ca sukhī
435:651: yāva ca durlabho'dya labhitaḥ kṣaṇavara amṛto
435:653: yāva jarā ca vyādhimaraṇaṃ na kupitarūpavaṃ
435:669: kiṃ narasiṃha sevita vane ramasu yuvatibhiḥ||121||
435:679: te tvaya labdha ye suravarairabhilaṣita sadā||123||
435:688: kiṃ tava āryaputra vikṛtaṃ yadi na bhajase||125||
435:696: gauravu tuṣṭa prema janiyā staviṣu hitakaram||127||
435:704: sādhvasa naṃ hi tāta pratighaṃ amaranaraguroḥ||129||
435:706: nāpi saraktu prekṣati janaṃ na pi ca sabhṛkuṭiḥ|
435:707: meru caleya śuṣya udadhiḥ śaśiravi prapate
435:708: naiva sa doṣadarśi tribhave pramadavaśa gamiyā||130||
435:709: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyānidaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā bhūyasyā mātrayā duḥkhito durmanā anāttamanāḥ praduṣṭamanāstāṃ svaduhitṝnāmantrayate sma— kathaṃ bho na śakyate sa bodhimaṇḍādutthāpayitum?
435:710: mā khalu mūḍhaḥ ajño'tha yuṣmākaṃ rūpākṛtiṃ na paśyati?
435:711: atha khalu tā māraduhitaraḥ svapitaraṃ gāthābhiḥ pratyabhāṣanta—
435:712: ślakṣṇā madhuraṃ ca bhāṣate na ca rakto
435:713: guru guhyaṃ ca nirīkṣate na ca duṣṭaḥ|
435:714: īryāṃ caryāṃ ca prekṣate na ca mūḍhaḥ
435:718: naivāstyasau divi bhuvīha naraḥ suro vā
435:722: taṃ dṛṣṭa ekamapi kampitu nāsya cittaṃ
435:730: tātā na rocati hi no va raṇe vivāde
435:736: ye cetanā api ca ye ca acetanā ca
435:746: tadyathā-śrīḥ vṛddhiḥ tapā śreyasī viduḥ ojobalā satyavādinī samaṅginī ca|
435:747: tā etā bodhisattvaṃ saṃpūjya ṣoḍaśabhirākārairbodhisattvaṃ śriyā vardhayanti sma,
435:749: upaśobhase tvaṃ viśuddhasattva candra iva śuklapakṣe|
435:750: abhivirocase tvaṃ viśuddhabuddha sūrya iva prodayamānaḥ||139||
435:753: vibhrājase tvaṃ agrasattva parvatarāja iva sāgaramadhye|
435:758: akaluṣabuddhirasi agrasattva anavatapta iva saraḥ sadā prasannaḥ||143||
435:759: aniketabuddhistvaṃ agrasattva māruta iva sarvaloke sadāprasaktaḥ|
435:760: durāsadasttvaṃ agrasattva tejorāja iva sarvamanyunā prahīnaḥ||144||
435:761: balavānasi tvaṃ agrasattva nārāyaṇa iva durdharṣaḥ|
435:765: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo bodhivṛkṣadevatāḥ ṣoḍaśākāraṃ bodhisattvaṃ śriyā vardhayanti sma||
435:766: tatra bhikṣavaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākārairmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsaṃ durbalaṃ kurvanti sma|
435:770: ekākyasi tvaṃ pāpīyaṃ nirjita iva śūrapratijñaḥ|
435:771: advitīyastvaṃ pāpīyaṃ aṭavyāṃ tyakta iva rogārtaḥ||148||
435:778: palāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ koṣṭuka iva siṃhanādena|
435:779: vidhuneṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ vairambhavāyuvikṣipta iva pakṣī||152||
435:784: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākārairmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsaṃ durbalamakārṣuḥ||
435:785: tatra bhikṣavo bodhiparicārikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākārairmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsaṃ vichacdayanti sma|
435:787: adya tvaṃ pāpīyaṃ nirjeṣyase bodhisattvena parasainya iva śūreṇa|
435:788: nigṛhīṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena durbalamalla iva mahāmallena||155||
435:789: abhibhaviṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena khadyotakamiva sūryamaṇḍalena|
435:790: vidhvaṃsayiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena muñjamuṣṭimiva mahāmārutena||156||
435:791: vitrāsiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena kesariṇeva śṛgālaḥ|
435:792: prapātiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsāla iva mūlachinnam||157||
435:794: viśoṣiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena goṣpadavārīva mahātapena||158||
435:795: palāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena vadhyavimukta iva dhūrtapuruṣaḥ|
435:796: udbhrāmiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena agnidāheneva madhukaravṛndam||159||
435:797: roṣiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena rāṣṭrabhraṣṭa iva dharmarājaḥ|
435:798: dhyāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena jīrṇakroñca iva lūnapakṣaḥ||160||
435:799: vibhartsyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena kṣīṇapathyādana ivāṭavīkāntāre|
435:800: vilapiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena bhinnayānapātra iva mahārṇave||161||
435:801: āmlāyiṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena kalpadāha iva tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ|
435:802: vikiriṣyase tvamadya pāpīyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāvajreṇeva girikūṭam||162||
435:803: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo bodhiparicārikā devaputrāḥ ṣoḍaśākārairmāraṃ vicchandayanti sma|
435:804: na ca māraḥ pāpīyān vinivartate sma||
435:806: bhūtāṃ codana śrutva devatagaṇā na nivartate so'ntako
435:807: ucchethā hanathā vilumpatha imāṃ mā dāsyathā jīvitam|
435:808: eṣottīrṇa svayaṃ mamāpi viṣayāṃ tāriṣyate cāparāṃ
435:809: nānyaṃ mokṣa vademi kiṃci śramaṇe utthāpayetprakramet||163||
435:811: meruḥ parvatarāja sthānatu cale sarvaṃ jaganno bhavet
435:818: vyāptā mayā mama vaśena ca yānti sarve
435:838: kartā na karta iti cāpyapare bruvanti||169||
435:840: tvāṃ jitva māra vihataṃ sabalaṃ sasainyam|
435:843: māraḥ kruddho duṣṭo ruṣṭaḥ paruṣagira puna tu bhaṇate gṛhāṇa sugautamaṃ
435:844: eṣo hyeko'raṇye nyasto grahiya mama puratu vrajathā laghuṃ vaśu kurvathā|
435:845: śīghraṃ gatvā mahyaṃ gehe haḍinigaḍayugalavikṛtaṃ karotha duvārikaṃ
435:846: svā maṃ drakṣye duḥkhenārtaṃ bahuvividhajavitaravitaṃ marūṇa va ceṭakam||171||
435:848: śakyākāśe lekhyaṃ citraṃ bahuvividhavikṛta padaśaḥ prakartu pṛthakpṛthak
435:849: śakyo vāyuḥ pāśairbaddhuṃ diśavidiśagamanajavito nareṇa suyatnataḥ|
435:850: śakyā kartuṃ candrādityau tamatimiravitimirakarau nabho'dya mahītalaṃ
435:854: ha putra vatsa dayitā kimasi pranaṣṭo
435:864: bhittvā ca yo raju gaṇeya mahāsahasra
435:867: so cāpi māṃ tarugataṃ na viheṭhayeta||175||
435:871: mā veṇuyaṣṭi haritāṃ va chinadmi te'dya||176||
435:873: sarveyaṃ trisahasra medini yadi māraiḥ prapūrṇā bhavet
435:874: sarveṣāṃ yatha meru parvatavaraḥ pāṇīṣu khaṅgo bhavet|
435:875: te mahyaṃ na samartha loma calituṃ prāgeva māṃ ghātituṃ
435:876: mā dūṣī nativela saṃpranadahe smāremi te'nadṛḍham||177||
435:894: vāme ca dakṣiṇa patanti aho ti vatsa|
435:899: naivātra māru na balaṃ na jaganna cātmā
435:902: srotaṃ ca ghrāṇa tathā jihva tathaiva kāyaḥ|
435:915: citrā mi yajña nayutānapi yaṣṭa pūrve
435:916: na mi jātu yācanaka bandhakṛtā nu dāsye||187||
435:917: āpo mi sākṣi tatha teja tathaiva vāyu
435:919: buddhā mi sākṣi daśasu sthita ye diśāsu
435:921: dānaṃ mi sākṣi tatha śīlu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ
435:922: vīryāpi sākṣi tatha dhyāna tathaiva prajñā|
435:923: catura pramāṇa mama sākṣi tathā abhijñā
435:926: yatteṣu puṇya bala śīlu tathaiva jñānam|
435:927: yajñā nirargaḍa ya yaṣṭa śaṭhaḥ kalībhiḥ
435:928: te mahya roma śatimāṃ kala nopayanti||190||
435:936: bhrāntaṃ mano namucito gatu citta moham||192||
435:941: mātā svasā pitara putra tathaiva bhrātā
435:942: pṛcchanti tatra kahi dṛṣṭa kahiṃ gatā vā|
435:948: ābhāsi dṛṣṭa yadi jīvasi taṃ khu prītāḥ||195||
435:949: sā vṛkṣadevata tadā karuṇāṃ hi kṛtvā
435:951: uttiṣṭha śīghra vraja he ma puno vilamba
435:954: duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ vyasana śoka vināśanaṃ ca
435:959: bhayaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ vyasanaṃ ca dainyaṃ
435:970: acchā drume tuva ca śūra jitārisiṃhā||200||
